description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Looking for a simple, family-friendly game that is easy to pick up......Look no further!  We took the successful formula of Meet UR Match and gave it Avatars - High Scores - Saving - New Gameplay Modes- New Analog control system plus all the cool features that made it so much fun in the first place!
